PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-01602013-02-22,  ,  EC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectHeavy-duty Vehicle and Engine Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations
PrecisHEAVY-DUTY VEHICLE AND ENGINE GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS in order to reduce greenhouse gases emissions by establishing mandatory greenhouse gases emission standards for new on-road heavy-duty vehicles and engines that are aligned with U.S. national standards.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0024 Publication Date: 2013-03-13
AttachmentsAttachment
